GLRESETHISTOGRAM(3G) GLRESETHISTOGRAM(3G)

NAME

glResetHistogram - reset histogram table entries to zero

C SPECIFICATION

void glResetHistogram( GLenum target )









PARAMETERS



  
target

  
Must be GL_HISTOGRAM.








DESCRIPTION


glResetHistogram resets all the elements of the current
    histogram table to zero.






NOTES


glResetHistogram is present only if GL_ARB_imaging
    is returned when glGetString is called with an argument of
    GL_EXTENSIONS.






ERRORS


GL_INVALID_ENUM is generated if target is not
    GL_HISTOGRAM.


GL_INVALID_OPERATION is generated if
    glResetHistogram is executed between the execution of glBegin
    and the corresponding execution of glEnd.






SEE
  ALSO


glHistogram
